example.question_stem: A person wants to be able to have more natural power in their home. They choose to cease using a traditional electric company to source this electricity, and so decide to install

prompt:
Accurately answer the following question:

A person wants to be able to have more natural power in their home. They choose to cease using a traditional electric company to source this electricity, and so decide to install

Choices:
A. sun grafts
B. sunlight shields
C. panels collecting sunlight
D. solar bees


Instructions:
- Carefully read the question and all options.
- Select the single most correct answer.
- Respond ONLY in the following format: "The correct answer is A/B/C/D".
- Do not include any explanations, additional text, or punctuation besides the answer.
